5#include <unordered_set>

11namespace v8 {
12namespace internal {
13
14constexpr int kMaxJSStructFields = 999;
15// Note: For Wasm structs, we currently allow 2000 fields, because there was
16// specific demand for that. Ideally we'd have the same limit, but JS structs
17// rely on DescriptorArrays and are hence limited to 1020 fields at most.
18static_assert(kMaxJSStructFields <= kMaxNumberOfDescriptors);
19
20namespace {
21
22struct NameHandleHasher {
23 size_t operator()(Handle<Name> name) const { return name->hash(); }
24};
25
26struct UniqueNameHandleEqual {
27 bool operator()(Handle<Name> x, Handle<Name> y) const {
28 DCHECK(IsUniqueName(*x));
29 DCHECK(IsUniqueName(*y));
30 return *x == *y;
31 }
32};
33
34using UniqueNameHandleSet =
35 std::unordered_set<Handle<Name>, NameHandleHasher, UniqueNameHandleEqual>;
36
37} // namespace
38
39BUILTIN(SharedSpaceJSObjectHasInstance) {
40 HandleScope scope(isolate);
41 Handle<Object> constructor = args.receiver();
42 if (!IsJSFunction(*constructor)) {
43 return *isolate->factory()->false_value();
44 }
45
46 bool result;
47 MAYBE_ASSIGN_RETURN_FAILURE_ON_EXCEPTION(
48 isolate, result,
49 AlwaysSharedSpaceJSObject::HasInstance(
50 isolate, Handle<JSFunction>::cast(constructor),
51 args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1)));
52 return *isolate->factory()->ToBoolean(result);
53}
54
55namespace {
56Maybe<bool> CollectFieldsAndElements(Isolate* isolate,
57 Handle<JSReceiver> property_names,
58 int num_properties,
59 std::vector<Handle<Name>>& field_names,
60 std::set<uint32_t>& element_names) {
61 Handle<Object> raw_property_name;
62 Handle<Name> property_name;
63 UniqueNameHandleSet field_names_set;
64 for (int i = 0; i < num_properties; i++) {
65 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
66 isolate, raw_property_name,
67 JSReceiver::GetElement(isolate, property_names, i), Nothing<bool>());
68 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(isolate, property_name,
69 Object::ToName(isolate, raw_property_name),
70 Nothing<bool>());
71
72 bool is_duplicate;
73 size_t index;
74 if (!property_name->AsIntegerIndex(&index) ||
75 index > JSObject::kMaxElementIndex) {
76 property_name = isolate->factory()->InternalizeName(property_name);
77
78 // TODO(v8:12547): Support Symbols?
79 if (IsSymbol(*property_name)) {
80 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_VALUE(
81 isolate, NewTypeError(MessageTemplate::kSymbolToString),
82 Nothing<bool>());
83 }
84
85 is_duplicate = !field_names_set.insert(property_name).second;
86 // Keep the field names in the original order.
87 if (!is_duplicate) field_names.push_back(property_name);
88 } else {
89 is_duplicate = !element_names.insert(static_cast<uint32_t>(index)).second;
90 }
91
92 if (is_duplicate) {
93 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_VALUE(
94 isolate,
95 NewTypeError(MessageTemplate::kDuplicateTemplateProperty,
96 property_name),
97 Nothing<bool>());
98 }
99 }
100
101 return Just(true);
102}
103} // namespace
104
105BUILTIN(SharedStructTypeConstructor) {
106 DCHECK(v8_flags.shared_string_table);
107
108 HandleScope scope(isolate);
109 auto* factory = isolate->factory();
110
111 Handle<Map> instance_map;
112
113 {
114 // Step 1: Collect the struct's property names and create the instance map.
115
116 Handle<JSReceiver> property_names_arg;
117 if (!IsJSReceiver(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1))) {
118 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_FAILURE(
119 isolate,
120 NewTypeError(MessageTemplate::kArgumentIsNonObject,
121 factory->NewStringFromAsciiChecked("property names")));
122 }
123 property_names_arg = args.at<JSReceiver>(1);
124
125 // Treat property_names_arg as arraylike.
126 Handle<Object> raw_length_number;
127 ASSIGN_RETURN_FAILURE_ON_EXCEPTION(
128 isolate, raw_length_number,
129 Object::GetLengthFromArrayLike(isolate, property_names_arg));
130 double num_properties_double = Object::Number(*raw_length_number);
131 if (num_properties_double < 0 ||
132 num_properties_double > kMaxJSStructFields) {
133 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_FAILURE(
134 isolate, NewRangeError(MessageTemplate::kStructFieldCountOutOfRange));
135 }
136 int num_properties = static_cast<int>(num_properties_double);
137
138 std::vector<Handle<Name>> field_names;
139 std::set<uint32_t> element_names;
140 if (num_properties != 0) {
141 MAYBE_RETURN(
142 CollectFieldsAndElements(isolate, property_names_arg, num_properties,
143 field_names, element_names),
144 ReadOnlyRoots(isolate).exception());
145 }
146
147 if (IsUndefined(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 2), isolate)) {
148 // Create a new instance map if this type isn't registered.
149 instance_map = JSSharedStruct::CreateInstanceMap(
150 isolate, field_names, element_names, MaybeHandle<String>());
151 } else {
152 // Otherwise, get the canonical map.
153 if (!IsString(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 2))) {
154 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_FAILURE(
155 isolate, NewTypeError(MessageTemplate::kArgumentIsNonString,
156 factory->NewStringFromAsciiChecked(
157 "type registry key")));
158 }
159 ASSIGN_RETURN_FAILURE_ON_EXCEPTION(
160 isolate, instance_map,
161 isolate->shared_struct_type_registry()->Register(
162 isolate, args.at<String>(2), field_names, element_names));
163 }
164 }
165
166 // Step 2: Creat the JSFunction constructor. This is always created anew,
167 // regardless of whether the type is registered.
168 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> info =
169 isolate->factory()->NewSharedFunctionInfoForBuiltin(
170 isolate->factory()->empty_string(), Builtin::kSharedStructConstructor,
171 FunctionKind::kNormalFunction);
172 info->set_internal_formal_parameter_count(JSParameterCount(0));
173 info->set_length(0);
174
175 Handle<JSFunction> constructor =
176 Factory::JSFunctionBuilder{isolate, info, isolate->native_context()}
177 .set_map(isolate->strict_function_with_readonly_prototype_map())
178 .Build();
179 constructor->set_prototype_or_initial_map(*instance_map, kReleaseStore);
180
181 JSObject::AddProperty(
182 isolate, constructor, factory->has_instance_symbol(),
183 handle(isolate->native_context()->shared_space_js_object_has_instance(),
184 isolate),
185 ALL_ATTRIBUTES_MASK);
186
187 return *constructor;
188}
189
190BUILTIN(SharedStructConstructor) {
191 HandleScope scope(isolate);
192 Handle<JSFunction> constructor(args.target());
193 Handle<Map> instance_map(constructor->initial_map(), isolate);
194 return *isolate->factory()->NewJSSharedStruct(
195 args.target(),
196 JSSharedStruct::GetElementsTemplate(isolate, *instance_map));
197}
198
199BUILTIN(SharedStructTypeIsSharedStruct) {
200 HandleScope scope(isolate);
201 return isolate->heap()->ToBoolean(
202 IsJSSharedStruct(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1)));
203}
204
205BUILTIN(AtomicsMutexIsMutex) {
206 HandleScope scope(isolate);
207 return isolate->heap()->ToBoolean(
208 IsJSAtomicsMutex(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1)));
209}
210
211BUILTIN(AtomicsConditionIsCondition) {
212 HandleScope scope(isolate);
213 return isolate->heap()->ToBoolean(
214 IsJSAtomicsCondition(*args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1)));
215}

217} // namespace internal
